caption:
Table 2: Results on the Human3.6M dataset. Comparison of our self-supervised approach with state-of-the-art weakly-and 
fully-supervised methods following evaluation Protocol-I (without rigid alignment) individually for all 15 actions. All values 
are given in mm.

Table 3: Results on the Human3.6M dataset. Comparison of our self-supervised approach with state-of-the-art supervised and 
weakly-and self-supervised methods following evaluation Protocol-II (with rigid alignment) individually for all 15 actions. 
All values are given in mm.

Table 4: Evaluation results for the MPII-INF-3DHP dataset. 
Best results are marked in bold. MPJPE and PMPJPE are 
given in mm, PCK and AUC are given in %. Best in bold, 
second best underlined.
Table 5: Effect of the multi-view information.
Table 6: Effect of the 2D Pose Estimation on Human3.6M.
Table 7: Effect of the Receptive Field on Human3.6M.

Table 8: Evaluation results for protocol-II with the 243-frames temporal model and different levels of gaussian noise N (0, ?) 
(? is the standard deviation) added to the ground-truth 2D positions (GT). All values are given in mm.
